activities: ServiceMax provides a web based solution to assist companies in the management and delivery of field services.  Personal information may be stored in the solution by customers in order to record and describe service technician work locations and skills.  This information is used for dispatching and scheduling work orders to technicians.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Medical Equipment - (MED)General Services - (GSV)Laboratory Scientific Instruments - (LAB)Textile Machinery & Equipment - (TXM)
personaldata: Personal data processed by ServiceMax includes service technician skills, location and service history.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
